burtis.modules.simulation.models

Class BusManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • burtis.modules.simulation.models.BusManager

  • public class BusManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages buses in simulation module.
    Author:
    Amadeusz Sadowski, Mikołaj Sowiński

      • BusManager

        public BusManager(BusStopManager busStopManager,
                  int numberOfBuses,
                  Depot depot,
                  java.util.logging.Logger logger)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        busStopManager - - reference to BusStopManager.
        numberOfBuses - - number of buses to create.
        depot - - the depot to initially put all buses into.
        logger - - the logger to be used.

    • Method Detail

      • getBusById

        public Bus getBusById(int busId)
        Returns bus of given id.
        Parameters:
        busId - bus id
        Returns:
        Bus

      • add

        public Bus add(int capacity)
        Adds new bus of given capacity. New buses are created in a depot state.
        Parameters:
        capacity - bus capacity
        Returns:
        newly created bus

      • updateBusPositions

        public void updateBusPositions()
                        throws NoSuchBusStopException
        Executes Bus.updateBusPosition() on every bus.
        Throws:
        NoSuchBusStopException - - when updating fails because of stop list error.

      • withdrawBus

        public void withdrawBus(int busId)
        Withdraws bus of given id. Bus will be withdrawn to the depot at the moment of the arrival to the terminus.
        Parameters:
        busId - bus id

      • sendFromDepot

        public void sendFromDepot(int busId)
                   throws NoSuchBusStopException
        Sets bus to start at next iteration after arriving from the depot. Clears bus cycles count.
        Parameters:
        busId - id of the bus
        Throws:
        NoSuchBusStopException - - when sending fails because of stop list error.

      • sendFromTerminus

        public void sendFromTerminus(int busId)
        Sets bus to start at next iteration after being at the terminus. Increments bus cycles count.
        Parameters:
        busId - id of the bus

      • getMockups

        public java.util.List<MockupBus> getMockups()
        Generates list of MockupBus.
        Returns:
        - list of MockupBus

      • getBusStopsIdsList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getBusStopsIdsList()
        Builds list of ids of bus stops that are to be queried for waiting passengers.
        Returns:
        list of bus stop numerical identifiers.

      • processWaitingPassengersQueryResponse

        public void processWaitingPassengersQueryResponse(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> response)
                                           throws NoSuchBusStopException
        Sets response bits in bus objects and triggers response processing on every bus that requested information.
        Parameters:
        response - - updated with new response if requested by given bus.
        Throws:
        NoSuchBusStopException - - when there is error with incorrect bus stop list.

      • addBusArrival

        public void addBusArrival(Bus bus,
                          BusStop busStop)
        Adds bus to the list of buses that arrives at the bus stop in current iteration.
        Parameters:
        bus - - bus to be added.
        busStop - - stop on which the bus will arrive.

      • getBusArrivalsList

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> getBusArrivalsList()
        List of arrivals is cleared upon retrieval.
        Returns:
        map of IDs of buses that arrives at the bus stop in the current iteration together with corresponding bus stops ids

      • processBusDeparturesList

        public void processBusDeparturesList(java.util.List<BusDepartureInfo> departureList)
                              throws NoSuchBusStopException
        Sends buses to terminus or departs them to next bus stop if appropriate.
        Parameters:
        departureList - - list of departure information.
        Throws:
        NoSuchBusStopException - - when there is error with bus stop list.

      • departBus

        private void departBus(int busId,
                       java.lang.String nextBusStopName)
                throws NoSuchBusStopException
        Calls Bus.depart(String) at bus of given id, with bus stop name parameter.
        Parameters:
        busId - - id of bus that is to be departed
        nextBusStopName - - name of next bus stop that is requested by passengers
        Throws:
        NoSuchBusStopException - - when there is error with bus stop list.

      • getBusMockups

        public java.util.List<MockupBus> getBusMockups()
        Returns list of @{link MockupBus objects corresponding to the current state of the buses.
        Returns:
        list of bus mockups.

      • moveBusesToDepot

        public void moveBusesToDepot()
        Withdraws buses with goToDepot set true to the depot.
